description: A dictionary of technical defects that render source warrant data tainted and void ab initio.

bulk_processing_artifact.label: Bulk Processing Artifact
bulk_processing_artifact.description: Timestamps indicating less than 60 seconds of judicial review time per case, evidencing bulk/batch processing without individual scrutiny.
bulk_processing_artifact.legal_basis: Rights of Entry (Gas and Electricity Boards) Act 1954; rubber-stamp doctrine

facial_defect_signature.label: Facial Defect Signature
facial_defect_signature.description: Missing or robo-signed judicial authorisation â€” warrant lacks a genuine, individualised judicial signature.
facial_defect_signature.legal_basis: Rights of Entry (Gas and Electricity Boards) Act 1954; Fourth Amendment (US)

jurisdiction_mismatch.label: Jurisdiction Mismatch
jurisdiction_mismatch.description: Warrant issued by a court outside the area in which the subject property is located.
jurisdiction_mismatch.legal_basis: Rights of Entry (Gas and Electricity Boards) Act 1954 s.2

venue_data_missing.label: Venue Data Missing
venue_data_missing.description: Warrant record lacks specific court location data, making judicial authorisation unverifiable.
